name: Pandorum Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
description: Developer of functional human tissues designed for tissue engineering and regenerative medicine. The company's experimental-stage human liver tissue is created using three-dimensional printing technology and acts as an artificial liver during liver failures or liver transplantation and takes less time to regenerate, enabling surgeons to assure painless liver surgeries.
one_liner: Developer of functional human tissues designed for tissue engineering and regenerative medicine. The company's experimental-stage human liver tissue is created using three-dimensional printing technology and acts as an artificial liver during liver failures or liver transplantation and takes less time to regenerate, enabling surgeons to assure painless liver surgeries.
